title: Anyone looking for Dudley stamped T206s?
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: Anyone looking for Dudley stamped T206s?
posts.post_content: Have a line on one currently on eBay that is very poorly desribed. Know someone after Bakers, someone after Tisdales, I'm always after McCormicks, but didn't know if anyone collected Dudley's old cards. Contact me if you would like the link to the auction. Ed
